review: Modelnya memang keren. Tetapi tidak ergonomis, karena tidak bisa menahan jari manis + kelingking. Lalu mouse wheel-nya juga tenggelam dan susah diklik. Jika komputer sedang standby atau screen saver, maka sensor pergerakan mouse mati, sehingga tidak bergerak pointer di komputer, yang menyebabkan komputer tidak bisa wake up dengan gerakan mouse. Sensor pergerakan mouse juga sangat lambat, jika dibandingkan mouse gaming. Hal ini membuat gerakan mouse tidak berfungsi dengan baik di atas mouse pad dan kertas. Jadi sangat tidak cocok untuk gaming. Hanya cocok buat pekerjaan kantoran saja.
translate: the model is really cool. but it's not ergonomic, because it can't hold the ring finger + little finger. then the mouse wheel also sinks and is hard to click. if the computer is in standby or screen saver, then the mouse movement sensor is off, so the pointer does not move on the computer, which causes the computer to not be able to wake up with mouse movement. the mouse movement sensor is also very slow, when compared to a gaming mouse. this makes mouseovers not work properly on the mouse pad and paper. so it is not very suitable for gaming. only suitable for office work only.

review:
Mousenya lumayan, berfungsi dengan baik. Fitur auto sleepnya juga berfungsi dengan baik, mouse cuman sleep kalau tidak di pakai (selama pemakaian mouse tidak pernah mati sendiri, kalau ditinggal setelah 5 menitan baru auto sleepnya jalan). mouse cukup ringan dan lumayan fit ditangan saya. Tombol mousenya clicky layaknya mouse mouse di warnet. Tombol tambahanya (di sisi kiri) feelnya lebih ringan Quality checknya tolong ditingkatkan lecet sedikit seperti di gambar cuman tidak terlalu kelihatan.
Edit 1: Kalau lampunya hidup tapi mousenya tidak jalan, coba ganti baterainya. Baterai gratisannya cuman tahan 16 hari saja (sekarang ganti batre AB* alkaline), pemakaian lumayan lama dan selalu dimatikan manual saat malam hari, bagi yg main fps atau game yg pakai teknik "flick" mungkin mouse ini kurang cocok.
translate: The mouse is not bad, it works fine. the auto sleep feature also works well, the mouse only sleeps if not in use (as long as you use the mouse it never turns itself off, if you leave it after a minute then the auto sleep starts). The mouse is quite light and quite fit in my hand. the mouse button is clicky like a mouse mouse in an internet cafe. the additional button (on the left side) feels lighter on the quality check please improve the scratches a bit like in the picture but not too visible. edit: if the light is on but the mouse doesn't work, try changing the battery. the free battery only lasts for a day (now replace the ab* alkaline battery), the usage is quite long and it is always turned off manually at night, for those who play fps or games that use the 'flick' technique; maybe this mouse is not suitable.

Produk sampai dengan selamat tanpa kerusakan. Acungan jempol untuk seller karena sudah packing dengan aman.

untuk performa tablet, bagi saya sudah cukup. untuk mengerjakan tugas di Word atau Excel tidak ada masalah. untuk main game sekelas MLBB juga cukup nyaman meskipun grafis low. 
Kelemahan adalah di bagian speaker yang berada di belakang bawah. Jadi waktu dipakai bersamaan dengan stand case nya jadi berasa mendem suaranya, dan juga sedikit nyempreng.
Dan stylusnya agak kurang, karena waktu buat gambar kadang tangan yang menempel di layar jadi ikut terdeteksi. Saran yang mau beli untuk gambar2 mending tambah beli drawing glove.
translate: product arrived safely without damage. Thumbs up to the seller for packing safely. for tablet performance, for me it is enough. to do assignments in word or excel there is no problem. playing mlbb class games is also quite comfortable even though the graphics are low. the weakness is in the speakers which are behind the bottom. so when it's used together with the stand case, the sound feels hot, and it's also a little cringy. and the stylus is a bit lacking, because when taking pictures sometimes a hand stuck to the screen is also detected. Suggestions for those who want to buy for drawings, it's better to buy a drawing glove.

review:
Lagi2 karena ambiguitas foto di highlight dengan "paket bundle" yg dibuat toko sehingga membuat customer salah pilih varian dan berujung kecewa,

Saya berniat beli paket tab yg sesuai highlight gambar (free stylus & cover tab sesuai gambar) dan tidak tau menahu perihal "varian" karena informasi yg sangat tidak jelas.

Seperti yg sudah saya katakan di review saya sebelumnya, jika memang membuat paket bundling, coba buat di fitur produk yg baru, jangan malah di edit di varian, dengan foto yg di highlight adalah yg free something, tapi default pilihan varian bukan sesuai foto yg di-highlight,

Seperti yg saya bilang, saya mohon maaf sudah memberi bintang 3 karena saya sangat kecewa sekali dan berharap tidak akan pernah belanja di toko ini lagi.
translate: again because of the ambiguity of the photos highlighted with the &#;bundle package' made by the shop, so that the customer chooses the wrong variant and ends up disappointed. I intend to buy the tab package that matches the highlight image (free stylus & cover tab according to the image) and I don't know anything about the "variant"; because the information is very unclear. as I said in my previous review, if you do make a bundling package, try making it in the new product feature, don't even edit it in the variants, with the highlighted photo is the free something, but the default variant choice doesn't match the photo shown -highlight, as I said, I apologize for giving a star because I am very disappointed and hope to never shop at this store again.

review: Produk sesuai deskripsi, Fira UI ringan & cepat, respon touchscreen baik, daya tahan baterai cukup. Build up quality vs harga sesuai ekspektasi. Performance bisa diandalkan, cukup untuk beberapa games hd yang sedang populer bagi anak-anak. Kualitas kamera?! Ah yang penting bisa dipake foto. Plastik belakang licin, terutama untuk tangan anak-anak. Kualitas suara?! Yang penting gak pecah suaranya. Overall this product is worthed & enough for my kiddos. Seller baik, pengiriman dalam batas wajar.. JNE Reg 4 hari baru sampai. Dapat bonus screen protector tanpa case. Padahal saya harapannya dapat case, karena agak sulit untuk mencari case produk seperti ini. Highly recommend buat hp pertama anak-anak. Good job Polytron Mobile, superb!
translate: the product corresponds to the description, fira ui is light & fast, touchscreen response is good, battery life is sufficient. build up quality vs price as expected. performance is reliable, enough for some popular hd games for children. camera quality?! ah, the important thing is that you can take photos. the back plastic is slippery, especially for children's hands. sound quality?! the important thing is not breaking the sound. overall this product is worth & enough for my kiddos. seller is good, delivery is within reasonable limits.. jne reg arrived the next day. got a bonus screen protector without a case. even though i hope to get a case, because it's rather difficult to find a case for a product like this. highly recommend for children's first cell phones. good job polytron mobile, superb!

Terima kasih.

review:
Produk diterima 7 hari setelah barang dikirimkan, masih butuh 1-2 hari lagi untuk proses, jadi total 9 hari. Lokasi seller ada di tangerang dan saya juga di tangerang, jadi butuh 9 hari untuk barang tersebut bisa sampai ke saya. Amat sangat lama.

Di halaman produk dan pada saat check out barang, tidak diinformasikan sama sekali mengenai durasi pengiriman. Seller menginformasikan di kolom chat (jadi jika tidak chat terlebih dulu) dan di kolom catatan penting. Jelas tidak semua orang chat terlebih dahulu ataupun melihat Catatan Penting. Jika memang sangat penting, seharusnya ditulis di Detail Produk. Yg lebih mengecewakan lagi, ketika seller di-chat, tidak ada response sama sekali, padahal statusnya boleh dibilang selalu online.

Dari sisi produk tidak ada masalah, sudah dicoba dan bagus. Tapi pengiriman dalam 1 kota yg makan 9 hari, saya kira pembeli manapun jika tau soal ini di depan, akan banyak yg tidak mau. Pengiriman barang yg sangat menjadi masalah di sini. Setelah saya baca2 review2 dari customer lain, bbrp orang pun complain hal yg sama. Bisa dicek di halaman review.
translate: the product is received the day after the item is shipped, it still takes - more days to process, so the total is days. the seller's location is in tangerang and i am also in tangerang, so it takes days for the item to reach me. very, very long. on the product page and when checking out the goods, there is no information at all about the delivery duration. seller informs in the chat column (so if you don't chat first) and in the important notes column. obviously not everyone chats first or sees important notes. if it is really important, it should be written in product details. what's even more disappointing, when the seller is chatted, there is no response at all, even though the status is arguably always online. from the product side there are no problems, it has been tried and it is good. but deliveries within the city take days, i think any buyer, if they know about this up front, many will not want it. delivery of goods is a real problem here. after i read reviews from other customers, several people complained about the same thing. you can check on the review page.

Ini pelayanan TERBURUK selama saya beli-beli kulkas ditokopedia.

review: Kualitas suara tv jelek, ketolong soundwoofer jdi lumayan. Admin chat sangat responsif hingga cuma di read tanpa di bales , bila balespun menggunakan template yg tidak nyambung.  Pengiriman ke Bekasi sangat cepat 10 hari (7 hari kerja). Admin sangatlah jujur, bilang 30 Maret udah di kirim ternyata belum, upload resi goib biar ga di cancel sistem, resi di rubah tetap tidak bisa tracking, ternyata yg tertera di resi pengiriman 8 April dgn nomer yg berbeda.  Terimakasih admin Polytron Official Store, berkat pelayanan ekstra Mu membuat Ku kapok untuk belanja dan menggunakan produk Polytron kembali. Terimakasih KGX Ekspres Mengirim paket dalam 1 hari dengan Aman.
translate: the sound quality of the tv is bad, but the soundwoofer is pretty good. admin chat is very responsive so that it is only read without replying, even if the reply uses a template that is not connected. delivery to bekasi is very fast (working days). the admin was very honest, said march had been sent but it wasn't yet, uploaded the goib receipt so the system wouldn't cancel it, the receipt was changed but still couldn't be tracking, it turned out that what was listed on the april delivery receipt was with a different number. thank you polytron official store admin, thanks to your extra service it made me give up on shopping and use polytron products again. thank you kgx express. sending parcels within days safely.

dari dulu pakai barang polytron, sesuai dengan ekspetasi.

HANYA SAJA, Admin Toko nya Bener2 mesti diganti.

- Chat nanya barang dicuekin (Padahal online trus).
- Ketika barang dipesan, baru diconfirm hari esok (ini sy ga masalah), tapi status langsung jadi SEDANG DIKIRIM. yang ada sy tungguin tuh barang seharian, diCHAT GA DIBALAS. Alhasil hari itu barang ga datang.
- Barang dtg setelah berapa hari (terpotong sabtu minggu tanpa kepastian kapan datang dan tentu saja tidak ada balasan chat dari adminnya)
- Setelah barang sampai, status sedang dikirim juga ga berubah berhari2 sampai sy harus komplain ke Tokopedia, baru statusnya dibantu ubahkan.

Pengalaman buruk belanja disini guys.
Bukan karena produknya, tapi karena pelayanannya SUPERSUCKS!
translate: i love the product! from the past using polytron items, according to expectations. only, the shop admin really needs to be replaced. - chat asked for items to be ignored (even though they were online). - when the item is ordered, it is confirmed the next day (i don't have a problem), but the status immediately becomes shipping. what i have been waiting for is the item all day, in the chat there is no reply. as a result that day the goods did not come. - items arrived after a few days (truncated on saturday and sunday without certainty when to arrive and of course there was no chat reply from the admin) - after the goods arrived, the status being sent also didn't change for days until i had to complain to tokopedia, then the status was helped to change it. bad experience shopping here guys. not because of the product, but because of the service supersucks!

STB nya dikemas rapi, packaging nya aman dan juga pelayanannya cepat. Karena tokonya official Polytron, jadi tidak perlu meragukan orisinalitasnya (masih ada segel di kardus Polytron)
Produknya bagus, pemasangan mudah. Jikalau perlu untuk upgrade linknya sudah disediakan di deskripsi. Daerah tempat tinggal kami, bisa dapat 20 hingga 40 channel tergantung pakai antenna indoor atau outdoor. Posisi antena saya masih indoor, tertangkap 30 channel minus MNC group. Semoga channel yang tidak tertangkap atau masih belum stabil kualitas sinyalnya bisa memperbaiki dan meningkatkan kualitas sinyalnya. Jadi pakai antenna indoor pun masih bisa tertangkap dengan lebih baik lagi.
translate: the stb is packed neatly, the packaging is safe and the service is also fast. because it's an official polytron shop, so there's no need to doubt its originality (still has a seal on the polytron box). good product, easy installation. if you need to upgrade the link is provided in the description. in the area where we live, we can get up to a channel depending on whether we use an indoor or outdoor antenna. my antenna position is still indoor, caught on the minus mnc group channel. hopefully the channels that are not caught or the signal quality is still unstable can improve and improve the signal quality. so using an indoor antenna can still be caught even better.

translate: the sound is steady. guaranteed warranty. quality can be contested. elegant design. easy to assemble. the material is sturdy. the only drawback is the very long delivery. i think, if the courier from the shop directly delivers it to the same area it will arrive quickly. even though the shipping costs are in rupiah, but it's still not as fast as the rupiah ones (free shipping) from tokped.. actually, this item is really urgent on the day of my order..on chat can send today no,always no answer..turn confirmed payment and chat,directly blz..funny..just like that i chat again, can the delivery be today or not? answered delivery to day..supposedly in the courier/delivery service selection column written down the estimated time..so if there is a buyer who has an urgency i won't be disappointed..i should give a star..only i appreciate the items i received..the item is good,smooth,design is ok,no dirty or scuffed..the sound is also very ok..maybe in the future if you want to get a perfect star(star) delivery for the area is prioritized..funny, for example there is a buyer on the side of the house, but those who were delivered first, those who were far away, then those who were close..

review:
beli bayar tanggal 26 , datang tanggal 29 . tapi barang yang di kirim salah . di katakan kesalahan ada di pihak expedisi .

ok lah yang salah pihak expedisi . tapi kenapa harus berlarut larut sampai 2 Minggu . di komplin untuk di tukar barang tapi gak di setujui . seakan ada drama yang sengaja untuk menjadikan saya penunggu untuk kesalahan orang lain . setiap hari Jum'at seakan harus  berkhotbah untuk meluapkan emosi karena  atas lambatnya penanganan komplin . sedangnkan saran dari Tokopedia yang menoton " harap pembeli menunggu , dan bila nanti barang telah di tukar , harap di konfirmasi di diskusi " dan itu di ulang ulang dan monoton banget untuk sebuah diskusi . .

keceqa banget karena tidak terdapat opsi lain ketika adanya kesalahan macam ini , seakan ada ungkapan yang muncul " salah sendiri kenapa percaya sama Tokopedia " 

buat Tokopedia @ trimakasih atas pengalaman yang meninspirasi ini , anda tiada duanya . 

Polytron oficial store @ kalau salahnya ketika anda memilih patner untuk expedisinya , apakah memang begitu SOP'nya  yaitu menjadikan pembeli menjadi korban untuk menunggu . kenapa dulu saya pilih beli di kamu . karena pengirimannya langsungkan mengunakan expedisi truk pabrik.

review: Alhamdulillah akhirnya sampai juga di rumah, pesan tgl 30 Des'20 baru dikirim merchant tgl 6 Jan'21, karena libur tahun baru. Pengiriman pas sampai ternyata pakai JNE tapi ga tertulis nomor resi dan pengirimannya di Blibli, tulisannya input data di paketnya tgl 7 Jan'21. Sampai di rumah dengan selamat tgl 9 Jan'21. Pengiriman cukup lama, tapi paling engga beli di official store jadi cukup lega. Oh iya, pengiriman bukan dari Kab. Tangerang, tapi dari cabang terdekat. Kebetulan saya dapet cabang dari Cikarang, Cibarusah. Yang penting selamat, barang dicoba juga beroperasi, Semoga Awet. Terimakasih Seller.
translate: thank god, finally arrived at home, ordered on dec', it was sent by the merchant on jan', because of the new year's holiday. when the delivery arrived it turned out to be using jne but the receipt number and delivery were not written on blibli, it said input data in the package on jan'. arrived home safely on jan'. delivery is quite long, but at least i don't buy it at the official store so it's quite relieved. oh yes, the shipment is not from kab. tangerang, but from the nearest branch. incidentally i got a branch from cikarang, cibarusah. the important thing is that it's safe, the item is tried to operate, i hope it lasts. thank you seller.

review: Barang sampai dgn selamat. Berfungsi dengan baik, tapi beberapa hari lalu sempat daging di freezer gak beku. Lalu ruang freezer jadi banyak tetesan air, entah kenapa. Setelah itu baru beku lagi, jadi skrg banyak tetesan air yg beku di body dalam freezer (cukup ganggu). Bisa jelaskan ini kenapa? Dan yang mau saya highlight adalah attitude admin tokped. Saya udah baca sih review orang2 soal perangai adminnya yang gak banget. Ternyata saya ngalamin sendiri. Udah balas pesan pakai huruf kapital (dia pikir pelanggan ini pada sakit mata kali ya), begitu diingatkan, malah membela diri nyari alasan. Lameass excuse. Kalo diingatkan tuh, mbok ya introspeksi. Masih mending diingetin buat fix attitude kamu yang jelek itu. Ini malah??? Hilang 1 bintang gara2 admin ğŸ‘ dan untuk brand sebesar Polytron, saya sangat kecewa dilayani admin yang se-rude ini. Tolong ditraining lagi adminnya, atau cari yang lebih sopan. Masih banyak yg butuh kerjaan di luar sana dgn attitude lebih baik. Dan satu lagi, saran saya status pengiriman dibuat lebih spesifik lagi, supaya pelanggan nggak ketar-ketir nungguin kapan datangnya. Ini kan kirimnya pakai logistik 3rd party ya. Ada baiknya  pelanggan bisa track realtime, soalnya web tracking logistiknya juga gak banyak membantu. Atau minimal adminnya update pengiriman scr reguler. Karena pas punya saya mau sampai itu dikabarinnya pas dia udah di dekat lokasi saya. Kasihan yang kerja dan gak ada orang di rumah.
translate: goods arrived safely. it works fine, but a few days ago the meat in the freezer wasn't frozen. then the freezer space got a lot of water droplets, i don't know why. after that, it just froze again, so now there are lots of frozen water droplets on the body in the freezer (quite annoying). can you explain why this is? and what i want to highlight is the attitude of the tokped admin. i've read people's reviews about the bad behavior of the admin. turns out i had it myself. already replied to the message using capital letters (he thought this customer had a sore eye), when he was reminded, he even defended himself looking for reasons. lameass excuse. if you are reminded, maybe introspection. it's still better to be reminded to fix your bad attitude. this even? missing a star because of the admin and for a brand as big as polytron, i am very disappointed to be served by an admin who is this rude. please train the admin again, or find someone who is more polite. there are still many who need a job out there with a better attitude. and one more thing, my suggestion is to make the delivery status even more specific, so that customers don't worry about waiting for it to arrive. it's sent using rd party logistics, right? it's good that customers can track realtime, because the logistics web tracking doesn't help much either. or at least the admin updates the delivery on a regular basis. because when i got it, i wanted to get to it when he was near my location. pity those who work and no one is home.

review:
Buat saya, POLYTRON adalah sebuah brand besar yang dikenal cukup lama sebagai produsen elektronik lokal di Indonesia. 

Namun SANGAT DISAYANGKAN, saya pribadi mendapat pengalaman sangat kurang baik kemarin, ketika membeli produk STB TV di Official Store Polytron yg ada di Tokopedia. 

Kekecewaan saya bermula saat saya sadar bahwa produk yang saya pesan tersebut belum juga tiba di alamat rumah saya. Padahal proses pembayaran berhasil dan telah dikonfirmasi oleh seller dari 3 hari sebelumnya.

Kemudian saya langsung buka riwayat pesanan di aplikasi, dan ternyata saya kaget ternyata status pesanan saya masih diproses oleh penjual/toko. Saya pun langsung menanyakan masalah ini kepada pihak toko melalui fitur chat penjual yang ada di Tokopedia. 

Setelah beberapa lama, pesan saya dibalas oleh admin Polytron official store. Namun sayang sekali, admin malah menjawab singkat, bahwa proses pengiriman perlu 10 hari. Padahal, informasi waktu tersebut tidak tersedia di halaman toko atau produk.

Besok beberapa hari setelahnya saya cek lagi, ternyata pengiriman barang masih belum juga jalan, keterangannya batal dipick-up oleh kurir karena alasan penjual (besoknya keterangannya berulang sampai 3-4 kali), dan akhirnya produk pesanan pun tiba di rumah setelah 2 minggu.

Setelah itu saya pribadi berkesimpulan, bahwa toko/admin terkesan sengaja mengulur waktu, kemungkinan padahal stok barangnya kosong karena kebanjiran pesanan.

Aahhh.. pokoknya saya kecewa dengan pelayanan official store Polytron di Tokopedia!!

Btw kualitas produknya sangat bagus, khususnya dari segi mode dan build quality materialnya. 

Lumayan lah jadi sedikit mengobati rasa kecewa saya.
translate: for me, polytron is a big brand that has been known for quite a long time as a local electronics manufacturer in indonesia. however, it is very unsafe, i personally had a very bad experience yesterday, when i bought stb tv products at the polytron official store in tokopedia. my disappointment started when i realized that the product i ordered had not yet arrived at my home address. even though the payment process was successful and was confirmed by the seller from the previous day. then i immediately opened the order history in the application, and it turned out that i was surprised that my order status was still being processed by the seller/shop. i immediately asked the store about this problem through the seller chat feature on tokopedia. after a while, the polytron official store admin replied to my message. but it's a shame, the admin instead answered briefly, that the delivery process takes days. in fact, the time information is not available on the shop or product page. tomorrow, a few days later, i checked again, it turned out that the delivery of the goods was still not working, the statement said that the courier had canceled the pick-up for reasons from the seller (the next day the information was repeated several times), and finally the ordered product arrived at the house after a week. after that, i personally came to the conclusion that the shop/admin seemed to be deliberately stalling for time, possibly even though the stock was empty due to a flood of orders. aah.. anyway i'm disappointed with polytron's official store service at tokopedia!! btw, the product quality is very good, especially in terms of fashion and build quality materials. it's not bad so it cures my disappointment a little.

review: speaker wireless dengan kualitas yang mengagumkan. walau hanya dijual dengan harga yang masih sangat terjangkau bila dibandingkan dengan merek-merek ternama lainnya. selain itu juga merupakan salah satu merek lokal yang cukup terkenal di Indonesia sendiri. Polytron juga merupakan salah satu pembuat berbagai alat audio video dengan kualitas terbaik di Indonesia. sayang yang menjadi minus dari produk ini adalah karena kesulitan koneksi wifi yang mana harus menggunakan aplikasi undok yang tidak terlalu stabil. selain itu antena wifi pada perangkat juga tidak terlalu kuat untuk menangkap sinyal wifi sendiri terutama bila penempatan router dan speaker beda lantai atau bila terhalang cukup banyak benda. pengiriman juga tidak terlalu cepat sekalipun pesanannya masih dibalut tidak hanya dengan plastik tapi juga dengan kardus tambahan pada bagian luarnya.
translate: wireless speakers with amazing quality. although only sold at a price that is still very affordable when compared to other well-known brands. besides that it is also one of the local brands which is quite famous in indonesia itself. polytron is also one of the manufacturers of the best quality audio video tools in indonesia. unfortunately the minus of this product is due to the difficulty of the wifi connection which has to use the download application which is not very stable. besides that the wifi antenna on the device is also not too strong to catch the wifi signal itself, especially if the placement of the router and speakers is on different floors or if there are quite a lot of objects blocking it. the delivery is also not too fast even though the order is still wrapped not only with plastic but also with additional cardboard on the outside.

Untuk tv nya saya gak ada masalah sm sekali. Semua lengkap kartu garansi, panduan, remote, baterai, baut smuanya ada lengkap dan berfungsi dengan baik.

Tapi untuk pengiriman sangat mengecewakan, saya pesan dari tgl 9 Nov baru saya terima barangnya tgl 18 Nov (9hari) untuk pengiriman tv saja. Itupun setalah saya komplain baru ada respon sebelum2 nya setiap saya chat Penjual tidak pernah ada balasan dari awal saya sblm beli menanyakan stok barang apakah ada sampai saya beraniin untuk co ttp penjual tidak balas chat saya.

Ada beberapa masalah saat beli brng ini.
1. Admin krng ramah menurut aku wajar klo customer nanya kapan dikirim krn kbtulan aku kerja jd mesti tau kpn bsa standby dirumah.
2. Pas pengiriman dr pihak kgx bener2 buru2 bahkan awalnya sampe kulkas ga mau dikeluarkan dr kardus. (Tgl 26)
3. Setelah kurir pergi baru sadar kaki kulkas tidak rata dan chat admin disertai mengaujakan komplain.
4. Untungnya dr Polytron service cepat datangnya dan orngnya super baik, diketahui kaki blkng penyok dan hari itu jg aku request penukaran unit (sumpah sempet deg2an parah) yg prosesnya 3-4 hari kerja (ini tgl 25 jun)
5. Unit pengganti datang tgl 30 juni stng H-1 ada org Polytron tlp mengabarkan dan yg anter jg org Polytron dimana jauh lbh baik dr kurir kgx yg diawal.
6. Untuk brngnya bagus seperti deskripsi dingin dan space luas.
Sekian review aku semoga admin tokped dan khususnya kurir pengiriman bisa diperbaiki krn jujur aku kapok si beli dsini. Thanks ğŸ™ğŸ»
translate: there were several problems when buying this item. . admin is not friendly, in my opinion, it's normal for customers to ask when it will be sent, because i happen to be working, so i have to know when i can be on standby at home. . when the delivery from kgx was really in a hurry, even at first, the refrigerator didn't want to be taken out of the box. (date) . after the courier left, he realized that the refrigerator feet were uneven and the admin chat was accompanied by complaints. . luckily dr. polytron service came quickly and the people were super nice, it was found that the back leg was dented and that day i also requested a unit exchange (i swear it was really bad) which was processed - working day (this is june). the replacement unit came on june around h- a polytron person telephoned to inform me and the one who delivered was also a polytron person which was much better than the kgx courier who was at the start. . the goods are as good as cold descriptions and wide space. that's all for my review, i hope that the tokped admin and especially the shipping courier can be fixed, because to be honest, i'm tired of buying here. thanks

translate: really drama the story of acquiring this refrigerator, buying for sudden delivery, when the courier asked for shareloc and said that it was already close to the house. i didn't notice even though i wasn't home that day. secondly, the admin's response was bad, the response was long and it didn't even get a response. next, the drama lasted for a month, the refrigerator was received, the compressor didn't lift, until i expressed disappointment out loud, then followed up. i complained on the day the refrigerator arrived, but there was no response. tokopedia care is really great at handling it, it really takes care of its customers. so when a new refrigerator came, a replacement for the broken one came, it didn't cool down too..tired right..eventually it cooled down after the day it was turned on. i don't recommend either from the admin's response, or from the type of refrigerator that doesn't have a problem even though i bought it new. that's the experience.

awalnya respon toko cepat karena dibalas dengan sistem. lalu dari jumat tidak diproses2, karena memang weekend, baru diproses senin dan langsung dikirim di hari senin. saya tunggu sampai hari kamis masih belum sampai, tidak bisa lacak pengiriman karena custom logistic dari toko, saya hubungi toko tapi sama sekali tidak direspon. lalu saya komplain melalui tokopedia karena chat ke toko tidak dibalas sama sekali. setelah masuk dana bermasalah baru deh tokonya merespon, baru diganti nomor resinya jadi bisa cek online di google. lucunya pengiriman senin tgl 22 dan baru sampai di ekspedisi tanggal 24. tanggal 25 seharian itu ekspedisi dalam tahap sortir barang dan ga selesai2.
saya selalu pilih barang dari official store karena terjamin aslinya, tetapi saya kecewa dengan official store polytron ini. proses barangnya sampai pengiriman terlalu lama, ekspedisi pun sangat lambat, maklum gratisan ğŸ¤« respon tokonya pun ga ada sama sekali, cuma balasan sistem aja di awal
polytron ini termasuk mengecewakan untuk kategori official store ğŸ˜¬
translate: initially the store's response was fast because it was answered by the system. then from friday it is not processed, because it is indeed the weekend, it is only processed on monday and immediately sent on monday. i waited until thursday and it still hasn't arrived, i can't track the delivery because of custom logistics from the store, i contacted the store but there was absolutely no response. then i complained through tokopedia because the chat to the store was not answered at all. after entering problem funds, the shop responded, then the receipt number was changed so you can check online on google. the funny thing is that the delivery was monday on the date and just arrived on the expedition date. the date of the day the expedition was in the stage of sorting goods and was not finished. i always choose stuff from the official store because it's guaranteed to be authentic, but i'm disappointed with this polytron official store. the process of the goods until delivery took too long, the expedition was very slow, it's understandable that the shop didn't even respond at all for free, only the system reply at the beginning of this polytron was disappointing for the official store category

review:
Barang nya sendiri ga ada masalah. Kualitas nya bagus. Tapi yg bikin rating ga maksimal itu service dari toko nya.

Dari pesan sampai terima barang, perlu waktu 12 hari. Padahal dari Tangerang ke Tangerang. Setiap ditanya via chat ttg update pengiriman nya, jawabannya template. Selalu bilang akan dicek, tapi in the end ga dikasih tau juga hasil pengecekan nya kaya apa.

Setelah barang sampai, pas diliat di resi, ternyata baru dikirim 10 hari setelah tanggal pesan.
**note: saya pesan tgl 15, (tulisan di resi) dikirim tgl 25, diterima tgl 27.

Kesimpulannya: perlu stok sabar yang buanyak kalau mau transaksi di toko ini.
translate: there is no problem with the item itself. the quality is good. but what makes the rating not optimal is the service from the shop. from ordering to receiving goods, it takes days. even though from tangerang to tangerang. every time i was asked via chat about the delivery update, the answer was a template. always said it would be checked, but in the end i wasn't told what the results of the checking were like. after the item arrived, when i looked at the receipt, it turned out that it was only sent the day after the order date. **note: i ordered the date, (writing on the receipt) was sent on the date, received on the date. in conclusion: you need a lot of patient stock if you want to do transactions at this shop.

review: Produk diterima dengan bagus dan berfungsi dengan baik . Pengiriman 5 hari dari pemesanan dan dikirim dari cikarang ke tambun selatan ..
translate: the product is well received and works well. delivery day from order and sent from cikarang to south tambun ..

review: air tidak dapat membeku dalam freezer
translate: water does not freeze in the freezer

review: Barang ok punya. pengiriman cepat dan rapi

review: Paking rapi...pengiriman cepat...mantap

review: pengiriman lambat, respon penjual untuk menjawab chat sangat buruk.
translate: slow delivery, seller's response to answer chat is very bad.

review:
kirim barangnya lama,posisi proses terus,lebih dr 10hr,chat ga pernah dibaca apalagi bales.
Mau batalin transaksi ga bisa, Karena sdh masuk proses,tp akhirnya dikirim juga,makanya kasih bintang 2.
translate: sending the item takes a long time, the position of the process continues, more than the day, the chat has never been read let alone replied. if you want to cancel the transaction, you can't, because it's already in the process, but it's finally sent, that's why i gave it a star.
